sense.def:
The introduction of something into a place or system
je dogodek, ko je nekaj prvič nekam postavljeno ali uporabljeno.

seg.quote: The Government saw the introduction of new technology as vital.

sense.def:
One's introduction to something
je priložnost, ko nekaj prvič doživimo.

seg.quote: This was my first real introduction to agriculture.

sense.def:
The introduction to a book or talk
pride na začetku knjige ali govora in nam pove, kakšna bo vsebina knjige ali govora.

To make an introduction
pomeni dvema osebama povedati, kako je drugi ime, da se lahko spoznata.
